subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Looking to make his mark in the 100 and 200 meters at the Olympics, Christophe Lemaitre is the fastest Frenchman in history, something he puts more stock in than being the fastest white man in history.
snippet: Looking to make his mark in the 100 and 200 meters at the Olympics, Christophe Lemaitre is the fastest Frenchman in history, something he puts more stock in than being the fastest white man in history.
